GapFillDragDrop.Title: Everyday activities
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Choose a word from the word pool and drag it to the correct place.

Content.Question:
1. Carla really loves shopping.
2. You spend too much time watching television.
3. Are you good at cooking?
4. Rick spends a lot of time doing nothing.
5. I’m not interested in reading.
6. Chris absolutely hates doing any exercise.
7. My colleague, Tim, is really into computer games.
8. Jenna doesn’t spend much time relaxing.
9. Eddie’s not very good at using the computer.
10. I don’t have enough time for texting my friends.
